typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (genres as string[], movieid as string, rating as string, title as string, year as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 filter(false()) ~> Filter1
source1 derive({} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true(),
		{} = true()) ~> DerivedColumn1
Filter1 sink(input(
		cast as string[],
		year as string,
		genres as string[],
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/title']) ~> sink1
